nodes.text: A shipsuit, manufactured by Ayelixe/Krongbing Textiles, was a multipocketed coverall made of a tough synthmesh fabric that could last through years of regular use. They had many pockets for carrying tools and equipment. Shipsuits were fireproof, although wearers could still be harmed and killed by raw heat, and electrically non-conductive. Fitted shipsuits could be used as the internal body sleeve for a enviro-suit, allowing the wearer to change into EVA equipment quickly.

During the Bakura Incident, Rebel Alliance personnel, including Commander Luke Skywalker, Captain Tessa Manchisco, and Princess Leia Organa wore white-, cream-, or gray-colored shipsuits while on the planet Bakura.
